text: Jacques G. Losman is a French transplant surgeon who helped to develop the heterotopic heart transplant model.Our Doctors: Jacques G. Losman, MD. Center for Wound Healing & Hyperbaric Medicine. Retrieved 9 September 2018. In 1997, he received the lifetime service award of the International Society for Heart and Lung Transplantation. == References == Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:French transplant surgeons
title: Jacques G. Losman
